text:p.text:span: Ruka
aAmang'ana amajomu ga Yesu kyego gang'orwa na
â€¨RUKA
Obhukangati
Omukuru Teofiro, amang'ana garya gakoreka gati yetu, abhantu bhaaru bhakoreri ekitunyo kya okugang'ora.
Bhaang'ora amang'ana kya garya twakeeribhwa na bhanu bherorera amang'ana gayo kwa ameeso gabho, kurwa ku-bhwambiro bhwa emirimu gya Yesu. Bhayo mbo bharinga bharanyaragan'ya ering'ana rya Waryubha.
Oni nonse nekomerye bhwahene kyego gakoreka kurwa ku-bhwambiro. Nkarora m-bujomu nkung'orere naho,
uuwe wonse obhe na obhuhene bhwa amang'ana ganu wehigiribhwa.
Obhurooti bhwa Okwibhurwa kwa Yoana Omubhatija

Eribhaga rinu Herode yaringa omukama wa Yudea, yaringa-ho omusyengeri umwi erina ryaye Zakaria wa omuganda gwa omusyengeri Abhia. Mkaye wonse, yaringa wa oruganda ruyo rwa omusyengeri Harooni eriina ryaye yabhirikirwanga Jabheti.
Bhabhiri bhayo bharinga na egintungwa embere ya Omukama Waryubha. Bhakagwata emigiro gyaye gyonsego, bhegwanga na amaragiriryo gaye bira masoro.
Bhabhiri bhayo bharinga bhatebhwiri, kwa bhurya omukari yaringa mugumba, na bhaaringa bhariri omunyu mwaaru.
Rusiku rumwi, rwaringa orwiru rwa omuganda gwa Zakaria okukora emirimu mu-risyengerero rya Waryubha.
Kuriing'aana na ekimiira kya obhusyengeri Zakaria akachwagurwa okusoha mu-risyengerero rya Waryubha amutuutire-mo ekurusu.
Zakaria hanu yasoha okutuuta ekurusu, abhantu bhaaru bharinga bhekekuman'ye kibhara, bharasabha Waryubha.
Rumwiigo, Zakaria akarwiirwa na maraika wa Waryubha, "uuu". Maraika uyo akemirira orubhaara rwa okuryo rwa emeja ya okututira ekurusu.
Zakaria hanu yamurora aketakya, "eee". Akoobhoha bhukong'u!
Naho maraika uyo akamukeerya, "Uuwe Zakaria tiga kobhoha! Ganu wasabhanga Waryubha, yagegwiri. Mkaaho Jabheti arikwiibhurira omwana wa ekisaaja, orimutoga Yoana.
Omwana uyo ng'o arikora mubhe na obhujomerwa bhukong'u na abhantu bhaaru bharijomererwa okwibhurwa kwaye.
Aribha mkuru embere ya Omukama. Atarija kunywa amarwa gogonse garya. Ariijuribhwa Omutima Omurabhu gwa Waryubha hata akyari munda ya ng'ina wabho.
Arihiindya abhantu bhaaru bha Israeri ku Omukama Waryubha wabho.

Arimukangatira Kristo, aseemye abhantu bharija kumuturung'ana, aryorokereribhwa na omutima na eginguru kya egya Eriya. Aribhagwatan'ya abhana na bhesewabho, na bhanu bhatana egintungwa ku Waryubha, aribhakora bhabhe nagyo bhwahene."
Zakaria akamubhuurya, "Ndegwa oni na mukani turingi bhagotu, eribha egaki twibhure omwana?"
Maraika akagamba ega, "Noni Gaburieri, unu ndemiirira embere ya Waryubha. Yantumiri enu oringi, nije kukukeerya amang'ana amajomu gayo.
Kwa okubha otakwikirirya amang'ana gani, kwambira bhoono orabha emumu na otakutura kuhaira mpaka kuhikya kwa eribhaga rinu ganu garikoreka. Na garikoreka kwibhaga ryaye."
Abhantu bhanu bhaaringa bharaganyirira Zakaria ahuruke kibhara, bhakaruguura kwa okurora kyego yatigita muyo.
Yaja kurwa-mo, atanagya kweki kugamba nabho, akamba kubhorokya na mabhoko. Rumwiigo, bhakamanya aruji obhuroti mu-risyengerero rya Waryubha. Wonse akagendererya kubha emumu.
Na eribhaga yaringa amariri ginsiku gyaye gya okukora emirimu mu-risyengerero rya Waryubha akagya ika.
Ebhagarindi, mkaye Jabheti akagega enda. Akamara mieri etanu yebhisiri, akagamba ega,
"Omukama ng'o yankoreriigo! Nonse yang'itukiri, yandusirye ginsoni ku-bhantu".
Obhuroti bhwa Okwibhurwa kwa Yesu
Enda iyo hanu yahikya mieri esansabha, Waryubha akatuma maraika Gaburieri ku-mugi gwa Nazareti mu-kyaro kya Gariraya.
Ahike ku muhara umwi, eriina ryaye Mariamu. Unu yaringa arombeerwe obhuko na musaja umwi, erina ryaye Yusufu, wa oruganda rwa omukama Daudi.
Maraika uyo, akagya wa Mariamu akamukeerya, "Ndakukeran'ya wenonkwe bhukong'u! Omukama Waryubha ari hamwi na uuwe".
Mariamu hanu yegwa amang'ana ga maraika uyo, enkoro yaye eketanduka bhukong'u akebhuurya, "Nkeran'ya ki inu?"
Naho maraika uyo akamukeerya, "Uuwe Mariamu tigakobhoha, wanonkwa ku Waryubha.
Bhoono oragega enda, wibhure omwana wa ekisaaja omutoge Yesu.
Aribha mukuru, aribhirikirwa mwana wa Waryubha unu aringi eguru yabhyonsego. Omukama Waryubha arimirirya kweki na arimuhana obhutungi bhwa omukama Daudi jaji wabho.
Na aribha Omukama wa abhantu bhonsego bha Israeri nsiku gyonsego, obhukama bhwaye, bhutarihwa kweki."
Mariamu akamubhuurya maraika ega, "Ganu garibha egaki enu oni ntamanyiri musaja?"

Akakyukya "Omutima Omurabhu gwa Waryubha gurikujira, na obhuturo bhwa Waryubha, unu ariguru ya gonsego bhurikukundikirya. Kwego, omwana unu oriibhura aribha mwahurwa na aribhirikirwa mwana wa Waryubha.
Na omuhiiri waho Jabheti unu bhabhirikiranga mugumba, mu-bhugotu bhwaye bhuyo, ya gegeri enda na omweri gunu ngwa kasansabha.
Yagegeri enda kwa okubha ku Waryubha, ritariho rinu ritakuturika."
Mariamu akakyukya, "Ndi mukoriwamirimu wa Omukama, ebhe kuoni kyego ogambiri". Rumwiigo, "uuu", maraika uyo akagya.
Mariamu Aragya Kukeeran'ya Jabheti
Kuginsiku giyogiyo, Mariamu akasemya orugendo akagya wa Jabheti, ku-mugi gumwi gwa kuginkuku gya Yudea.
Hanu yasoha mu-nyumba ya Zakaria, akakeran'ya Jabheti.
Jabheti hanu yegwa enkeran'ya ya Mariamu, omwana unu yaringa munda yaye akahooya. Hayohayo, Jabheti akejuribhwa na Omutima Omurabhu gwa Waryubha.
Akagamba rumwiigo kwa erisi enene,"Ku-bhakari bhonsego uuwe nuwe wanonkwa! Na omwana unu oriibhura, wonse yanonkwa.
Oni niwi, hata mayi wa Omukama wetu ujiri kunkeran'ya?
Kyego nigwiri enkeran'ya yaho, hayohayo omwana unu aringi munda yani rumwiigo yahooya kwa okujomerwa.
Uuwe wanonkwa kwa bhurya wikiriirye ega, ganu Omukama yakukeerya garikoreka!"
Eriimbo rya Mariamu
Mariamu akagamba ega,
"Enkoro yani eramukumya Omukama,
eriho erajomererwa Waryubha, unu yantuurya.
Kwa okubha, yang'iitukiri oni,
omukori wemirimu waye,
hata mbhe muntu wa insi.
Kurwa bhoono, abhantu bha nganda na nganda bharibha bharagamba ega,
oni ng'weriruguto.
Waryubha wa obhuturo yankoreeri ekika,
na eriina ryaye nirabhu.
Aragendererya kuseren'ya abhantu bha eginganda na eginganda bhanu bharamwigwa.
Akoreri amang'ana amakuru kwa eginguru gyaye,
yanyaragan'ya abhekisirani.
Akabheetuumya abhakuru ku-bhitumbi bhyabho bhya obhutungi,
abhanyohu akabheemukya.
Abhomweko akabheegutya bhujomu,
naho abhaami akabhaken'ya mabhoko masa.
Akabhasakirya Abhaisraeri abhakori bhaye bha emirimu,
kwa okuhiituka okubhaseren'ya.
Yakora gayo kyego yaringa arageni na Ibrahimu na bhajaji bhetu,
hata ku-bhantu bhonsego bha oruganda rwaye nsiku gyonsego."
Mariamu akekara owa Jabheti mieri esatu, akamara akahinda owaye.
Okwibhurwa kwa Yoana Omubhatija
Orusiku rwa okwibhura kwa Jabheti rukaahika, akeebhura omwana wa ekisaaja.
Abhaahang'i waye na bhahiiri bhaye, hanu bhegwa kyego Omukama yamukorera ekika, bhakajomerwa hamwi nawe.
Omwana uyo hanu yahikya orusiku rwa munane, bhakaaja kumusaara. Bhakenda bhamuhane eriina rya esewabho, Zakaria.
Hatego ng'ina wabho akanga, akagamba, "Abhirikirwe Yoana".
Bhakakyukya, "Ndegwa atariho muhiiri wenyu, unu arabhirikirwa eriina riyo?"
Bhakabhuurya esewabho kwa okumworokya na mabhoko, naho abhakeerye eriina rinu arenda kutoga omwana waye.
Akabhasabha ekibhaau akakyandika ega, "Eriina ryaye ng'o Yoana." Bhonsego bhakaruguura.
Rumwiigo, omunwa na orurimi rwaye bhikasikurirwa akamba okuhaira kweki, akamukumya Waryubha.
Abhaahang'i bhonsego bhakaruguura bhukong'u. Eng'ana iyo ekamanyikana bhukong'u ku-migi gyoonsego ginu giringi ku-ginkuku gya Yudea.
Bhonsego bhanu bhegwa, bhakabha bharebhuurya, "omwana uyo aribha muntu wa egaki?" Bhaagamba ego kwa okubha heene Waryubha yaringa hamwi nawe.
Eriimbo rya Zakaria
Zakaria esewabho omwana uyo, akejuribhwa Omutima Omurabhu gwa Waryubha. Akarusya obhuuroti ega,
"Omukama Waryubha wetu wa Israeri akumibhwe!
Kwa okubha yajiri kututurya bhetu abhantu bhaye.
Atuheeri omutuurya owa eginguru kurwa kuruganda rwa omkori waye wemirimu Daudi,
kyego bhurya yaringa amariri kugamba akare hayo kwa enjira ya abharoti bhaye bha mitima emirabhu.
Yatukeerya ega, akatutuurirye kurwa ku-bhasigu bhetu
na mu-mabhoko ga bhanu bhara tubhihirirwa.
Akagamba ega, alihituka emuma yaye endabhu inu yarya na bhajaji bhetu,
na aribhaseren'ya.
Emuma iyo ng'yo yarya na jaji wetu Ibrahimu.
Atutuurirye kurwa mu-mabhoko ga abhasigu bhetu,
naho tubhe turamusabha bira bhobha.
Naho tubhe abharabhu na abhaheene embere yaye, nsiku gwetu gyonseego.
Uuwe mwanawani, oribha orabhirikirwa muroti wa Waryubha,
unu ariguru ya bhyonsego.
Na orimukangatira Omukama, anyore omuseemerye enjira.
Orikeerya abhantu bhaye ega, bharituuribhwa
kwa okwabhirwa obhusarya bhwabho,
kwa enjira ya enonkwe ya Waryubha wetu.
Obhutuurya bhuyo bhuritujira kurwa murwire kya endingasi,
na bhurimirikira bhanu bhari mu-kisunte,
na munyanko ya eng'anga ya okukwa.
Bhuritorokeererya tugendenga ku-njira gya omurembe."
Omwana uyo, akakiina, akanyora ginguru munkoro yaye. Akagya kwikara ku-kibhara, mpaka eribhaga rinu yeyorokya ku Abhaisraeri.
Okwiibhurwa kwa Yesu
Ku-ginsiku giyo omukama Augusto wa Rumi, akaragirirya ega, abhantu bhoosego bhanu bharingi mu-bhyaro bhya ku-bhutungi bhwaye bhagye kung'orwa.
Okung'orwa kuyo kwaringa kwa-okwamba, kwakoreka eribhaga rinu Kurenio yaringa omutungi wa ekyaro kya Siria.
Ego, abhantu bhonsego bhakagya kira muntu mu-mugi gwa oruganda rwabho.

Yaringa-ho muntu umwi eriina ryaye Yusufu, wonse akarwa mu-mugi gwa Nazareti, mu-kyaro kya Gariraya, akarina kugya mu-mugi gwa Daudi, Beterehemu gunu guringi Yudea. Yagya eyo kwa okubha yaringa wa oruganda rwa Daudi.
Yusufu akagya okwing'ora hamwi na Mariamu, unu yaringa aromberi obhuko. Eribhaga riyo Mariaamu yaringa na enda.
Hanu bhahika eyo okwibhura kwaye kukahika.

Akebhura omwana wa ekisaaja omutangi, mu-nyumba yegintugo. Akamukundikirya emyenda gya ekyana, akamurarya mwitubha rya okurisya-mo gintugo. Yebhurira muyo kwa okubha bhatanyora omweya gwa okurara, mu-nyumba gya abhageni.
Abharisya Bhararwirwa na Maraika
Bharinga-ho abharisya bhararinda gintugo gyabho ku-kibhara bhutiku.
Rumwiigo, bhakarwirwa na maraika umwi, endingasi ya Omukama ekabhamirikira mbara gyonsego, bhakabha na enkubhi enene bhukong'u.
Maraika uyo akabhakeerya, "Mutige kobhoha, mbareteeri amang'ana amajomu ganu garijomera abhantu bhonsego.
Rero inu mu-mugi gwa Daudi, yebhwirwe omutuurya wenyu. Omutuurya uyo ng'o Kristo Omukama.
Ekimanyiriryo kya okorokya gayo niga, mwakanyoore omwana ekijaare araribhwe mwitubha rya okurisirya gintugo, akundikiribhwe emyenda gya ekyana."
Rumwiigo, bhakaja ebhiku na ebhiku bhya bha maraika kurwa murwire, bhakabha bharamukumya Waryubha ega,
"Waryubha wa murwire akumibhwe!
Na mu-kyaro, omurembe gubhe ku-bhantu bhanu arabhekirirya."
Maraika bhayo hanu bhaahinda murwire. Abharisya bhakagambana, "Tugende mu-mugi gwa Beterehemu turore ganu gatukiriyo, kyego Omukama atukererye".
Bhakagya bhwangu bhwangu, hanu bhaahika bhakanyoora Mariamu na Yusufu, na omwana ekijaare areri mwitubha rya okurisirya gintugo.
Hanu bhamara kumurora omwana uyo, bhakararika ku bhantu amang'ana gonsego ganu maraika abhakeererye eguru yaye.
Bhonsego bhanu bhegwa ganu bhakeeribhwa na abharisya, bhakaruguura bhukong'u.
Mariamu akagabhiika gayo gonsego mumoyo gwaye akabha aragetegerera.
Abharisya bhayo bhakahunjuka, enu bharamukumya Waryubha, kugonsego ganu bhegwa na okugarora. Kyego bhurya bhaakeribhwa na maraika, nigo gonsego gakoreka.
Omwana uyo, hanu yahikya orusiku rwa munane, bhakamusaara bhakamutoga Yesu. Riyo ndyo eriina rinu maraika yaringa amariri kumuhana, eribhaga ng'ina wabho yaringa akyari kugega enda.
Yesu Aratuurwa Mbere ya Waryubha
Yusufu na Mariamu bhamara ginsiku gya okuramwa kwabho kyego yenderwanga ku-maragiriryo ga Musa. Nho bhakahira Yesu mu-mugi gwa Yerusaremu, naho bhamuture embere ya Omukama.
Bhakora ego, kyego yang'orwa ku-maragiriryo ga Omukama ega, "Omwana omutangi we kisaaja, bhamwahure kubha embere ya Omukama".
Hamwi na gayo, bhendanga bhamurusirye ekimwenso kyego yang'orwa ku-maragiriryo ga Omukama, ega, "Bharenderwa bharusye bhiguti bhibhiri au amaana gabhiri ga ekiguti".

Yaringa-ho muntu umwi Yerusaremu hayo, eriina ryaye Simeoni. Yaringa muntu wa heene, mwitegereri ku Waryubha. Yaganyiriranga kurora okutuuribhwa kwa Israeri, kweki Omutima Omurabhu gwa Waryubha gwaringa hamwi nawe.
Omutima Omurabhu gwa Waryubha gwaringa gumukeererye ega, atarikwa akyari kurora Kiristo wa Omukama.

Abhebhuri bha Yesu hanu bhamuhira murubhago rwa erisyengerero rya Waryubha, bhakore kyego bhaaragiriribhwa na amaragiriryo ga Omukama. Simeoni wonse Omutima Omurabhu gwa Waryubha gukamworokeererya ega, asohe muyo.
Akatuura Mariamu omwana enu aramukumya Waryubha ega,
"Omukama, kyego wandaga oni omkori wemirimu waho,
naruji obhurage bhwaho,
bhoono okanyikiririrye nkwe na omurembe.
Kwa okubha niroreeri obhutuurya bhunu oreteri,
bhunu wa semerye naho bhutuuke ku-bhantu bhonsego.
Obhutuurya bhuyo ni ndingasi ya okorokya enjira yaho,
ku bhantu bhanu bhataringi abhayahudi.
Hata abhantu bhaaho bha Israeiri bhonsego bharitogonibhwa."
Amang'ana ganu Simeoni yagamba eguru ya omwana uyo, gakaruguurya abhebhuri bhaye.

Hayo Simeoni akabhanonka, akamukeerya Mariamu, ng'inawabho omwana uyo, "Omwana unu, asorerwe na Waryubha okusikya Abhaisraeri bhaaru na okutuurya abhandi bhaaru. Aribha ekimanyiriryo kya Waryubha, kinu kiryangwa na abhantu.
Abhantu bhayo, amang'ana ganu gebhisanga mumyoyo gyabho, garitubhuka ku-bhurabhu. Uuwe wonse oriigwa obhururu bhukong'u oribha kyaunu obhitirwe na omuhyu omoogi."

Yaringa-ho omuroti umwi omukungu bhukong'u, eriina ryaaye yabhirikirwanga Ana, muhara wa Fanueli, wa oruganda rwa Asheri. Yekara myaaka muhungati egyenego na musaja waye, kurwa kyego yatetwa, musaja waye akakwa.

Akatigara musino, akabha arasabha mu-risyengerero ya Waryubha mubhasu na bhutiku. Kwibhaga rya okusabha yenyimanga ebhyakurya. Hanu Yesu yaretwa mu-risyengerero rya Waryubha, Ana uyo yaringa ahikirye miaka mirongo munane na enna.
Ebhaga riyo riyo Ana akeyorokya, akaamba kumukumya Waryubha, akararika amang'ana ga omwana uyo kubhantu bhonsego bhanu bhaganyiriranga Waryubha atuurye Yerusaremu.
Yusufu na Mariamu, hanu bhaamara kukora gonsego ganu amaragiriryo ga Omukama gendanga, bhakahunjuka owabho mu-mugi gwa Nazareti, mu-kyaro kya Gariraya.
Omwana akakina, akabha na eginguru, akejuribhwa gitungwa, na yaringa aranonkwa na Waryubha.
